name: Tactical AR
description: Tactical AR was created with one purpose, to build real firearms skills and habits in virtual reality. Our philosophy is that the best training is fun, and that muscle memory developed in virtual reality effectively translates in to real weapon muscle memory.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i5 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 or better Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Multiple External Gun Controllers Supported
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Graphics: NVIDIA 1070 or better Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Multiple External Gun Controllers Supported
